entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 p.m. NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.5Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
